biocontainers.name: mauve
biocontainers.summary: Mauve is a system for constructing multiple genome alignments in the presence of large-scale evolutionary events such as rearrangement and inversion

biotools.summary: Mauve Genome Alignment software, for comparing two or more draft or finished genomes

bioschemas.name: Mauve
bioschemas.summary: Mauve Genome Alignment software, for comparing two or more draft or finished genomes
